hanzi-su-wiki:
奥

Значения

Глубь, внутренняя часть; жена, замужняя женщина; тёмный, мистический

Мнемоника

  • Изменено. Задняя часть дома 冂 со следами 采 большого человека 大, который ищет в темноте женщину.

  • "Я кладу рис 米 в большой 大 ящик, чтобы хранить его в тёмном складу."

Варианты

奧

ào
Austria; Austrian; abbr. for 奥地利 ; obscure; mysterious
Австрия; австрийский; сокр. Для Австрии; неясный; таинственный
rtega_mnemonic:
奧奧RS
奥奥		mysterious, obscure, profound, heart, interior
  • RS. sorting rice from rocks 釆/米 in (the interior of) the house 宀 with the hands 大
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 奧)
Ideographic: A person 大 discovering a house 宀 full of rice 米
purpleculture_examples:
奥运会 [ ào yùn huì ]: abbr. for 奥林匹克运动会 ; Olympic Games; the Olympics
冬奥会 [ dōng ào huì ]: winter Olympics
奥秘 [ ào mì ]: secret; mystery
奥委会 [ ào wěi huì ]: Olympic committee
奥妙 [ ào miào ]: marvelous; mysterious; profound; marvel; wonder
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • ⿵ Surround from above
      • 宀 [gàimian2] roof; house
      • 米 [ mǐ ] rice, millet, grain
    • 大 [ dà ] big, great, vast, high, deep
heisig_chinese_memo: In the core of a nuclear reactor, scientists have discovered a way of great depth (deep and smart in this case) to get power from rice, by making it pent in under high pressure. It's very dangerous, so they've trained a st. bernard dog to run things, he's adding more drops of rice as necessary.
heisig_constituent: core, drop, pent in, rice, large, St. Bernard
heisig_story: A drop . . . pent in . . . rice . . . St. Bernard dog. Notice that the horizontal line of the bottom primitive doubles up as the final stroke for pent in.
koohiiStory1: In the core of a nuclear reactor, scientists have discovered a way to get power from rice, by penting it in under high pressure. It´s very dangerous, so they´ve trained a st. bernard dog to run things, he´s adding more drops of rice as necessary.
koohiiStory2: 奥さん　（おくさん) is a common way to say "wife". In the innermost core of the house, the bored pent up housewife drops her chores and consumes so much rice she becomes a very large housewife.
jp_example_words:
奥(おく): interior
奥さん(おくさん): (polite) wife, your wife, his wife, married lady, madam
WaniKani_Radicals: 丶, 冂, 米, 大
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If there’s a drop on your head and the rice is big, you know you’re in the interior. And by interior, I mean you’re actually inside someone. The rice is big because you’ve shrunk to a tiny size and are inside someone’s stomach. The drop on your head is actually digestive fluid.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine being in the interior of someone’s tummy. See the big pieces of rice all around you as drops of stomach fluid continue to drop down on your head.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: While you’re in the interior of this guy, you hear him break out in song. He starts singing “Oklahoma” (おく) at the top of his lungs. The big pieces of rice slosh around as he sings and dances. “OOOOk-lahoma, where the wind comes sweepin' down the plain!”
WaniKani_Reading_Info: If you’re unfamiliar with this Oklahoma song, check it out on YouTube. Imagine being in the interior of someone’s belly as you hear this song booming all around you.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: whereupon (ノ) the wide (冂) rice (米) has a big (大) core
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If you wear this magic helmet you can have a conversation of great depth with your St. Bernard dog.  Not just discussions about a drop of droppings he sniffed.

Liushutong characters (5)

奥字的基本解释

奥
ào
含义深，不易理解：深奥。奥妙。奥秘。奥旨。
室内的西南角，泛指房屋及其他深处隐蔽的地方：堂奥。经堂入奥。
姓。

奥
yù
浊。
古同“燠”，暧。

奥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ào］
［《廣韻》烏到切，去号，影。］
“奧1”的新字形。亦作“2”。
(1)室内西南隅。古时祭祀设神主或尊长居坐之处。
(2)泛指内室。
(3)泛指室内深处。
(4)指隐秘处。
(5)深。
(6)奥妙；微妙。
(7)犹内。参见“奥内”。
(8)犹主，主事人。
(9)指主管的职事。
(10)猪圈。
(11)灶神。
(12)通“嶴”。山近水的地方。
(13)姓。
(14)奥斯忒的省称。磁场强度单位。为纪念丹麦物理学家奥斯忒（HansChristianOersted）而命名。
[②]［yù］
［《集韻》乙六切，入屋，影。］
“奧2”的新字形。
(1)后作“燠”。暖。
(2)通“澳”。水边深曲之处。
(3)通“澳”。污浊。
(4)后作“墺”、“隩”。谓可以定居的地方。
(5)后作“”。腌制。
(6)见“奥2李”。

奥字的英文翻译

◎ 奥
abstruse, profound

奥字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【大字部】　奧； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页253第15
【唐韻】烏到切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】於到切，?音墺。室西南隅，人所安息也。【禮·曲禮】爲人子者，居不主奧。【禮運】人情以爲田，故人以爲奧也。　又五祀之祭。【饒雙峰曰】五祀，先設主席，而祭于其所，親之也。後迎尸而祭于奧，尊之也。　又官職。【東觀漢記】桓帝時，初置祕書監，宜掌祕奧。　又積聚。【周語】野無奧草。　又烹和也。【荀子·大略篇】泔之傷人，不若奧之。　又山名。【山海經】丑陽之東三百里曰奧山，奧水出焉。　又七亂切，音竄。爨神也。【禮·禮運】奧者，老婦之祭也。【註】奧，當作爨，祭至尸食竟而祭爨神，其神則先炊也，故謂之老婦。　又【正韻】乙六切，音郁。隈也。水內曰奧。與澳隩通。　又與燠同。【詩·小雅】日月方奧。【前漢·五行志】厥罰常奧。　从宀从釆。俗作奥，非。【正字通】字彙廾部?，音訓重出，今倂于此。說文奧从宀?聲。宷，从宀从釆。从宀从釆或从凢从釆不成字。

奥字的源字形

奥字的起名意思

：深奥，精深，不易理解，室内的西南角。

Basic explanation of words
Oh
ào
The meaning is deep, not easy to understand: esoteric. secret. Mystery. Ultimatum.
The southwest corner of the room refers to houses and other hidden places in the depths: Tangao. Into the Austrian scriptures.
name.
Oh
yù
turbidity.
Gu Tong "Yi", warm.
Oh
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［ào］
["Guangyun" Wu to cut, go to the number, shadow. ]
The new font of "奥1". Also called "2".
(1) The southwest corner of the interior. In ancient times, there was a place where gods or lords lived for worship.
(2) Refers to the inner chamber in general.
(3) Refers to the deep part of the room.
(4) Refers to hidden places.
(5) Deep.
(6) Mystery; subtle.
(7) Just inside. See "Onet".
(8) The Lord Jude, the principal.
(9) Refers to the office of a supervisor.
(10) Pigpen.
(11) Kitchen God.
(12) Through "Ao". Mountain  near the water.
(13) Last name.
(14) The provincial name of Osté. The unit of magnetic field strength. Named in honor of the Danish physicist Hans Christian Oersted.
[②]［yù］
["Ji Yun" B and six cuts, enter the house, shadow. ]
The new font of "奥2".
(1) Later called "燠". warm.
(2) Through "Australia". Deeply curved on the water's edge.
(3) Through "Australia". Dirty.
(4) Later as "墺" and "隩". It is a place where you can settle down.
(5) Subsequent to "". Pickled.
(6) See "Ao 2 Lee".

ой
ào, yù
I сущ.
1) ào * юго-западный угол (сокровенное и почётное место дома)
奥窔之间 между юго-западным и юго-восточным углами (обр. о чем-л., не выходящем за пределы дома)
与其媚于奥宁媚于灶 посл. чем заискивать перед юго-западным углом (почётным местом дома), лучше заискивать перед очагом (полезным местом дома)
2) ào * внутренний покой, дальние комнаты; скрытое (потайное) место; внутренний, скрытый
奥藏 глубоко запрятать
穷奥 глубоко скрытое место, глубина (напр. гор)
3) ào сокровенная суть; секрет, тайна
冥反其奥 ощупью (по наитию) обнаружить его (явления) сокровенную сущность (секрет)
4) ào * свиной хлев
5) ào вм. 墺 (участок земли)
6) yù вм. 隩 (излучина берега)
II прил.
1) ào * главный, важный
故人以为奥也 поэтому люди считали это важным
2) ào глубокий, потайной; тайный; таинственный, загадочный, непонятный; сокровенный
结根奥且坚 сплетённые корни уходили глубоко и были крепки
奥恩 глубоко продумывать
3) ào непрозрачный, мутный
有沉而奥 быть глубоким и мутным
4) yù * вм. 燠 (тёплый, жаркий)
III ào собств.
1) геогр. (сокр. вм. 奥地利) Австрия; австрийский
奥匈帝国 ист. Австро-Венгерская империя, Австро-Венгрия
2) Ао (фамилия)

奥

Значения

Глубь, внутренняя часть; жена, замужняя женщина; тёмный, мистический

Мнемоника

  • Изменено. Задняя часть дома 冂 со следами 采 большого человека 大, который ищет в темноте женщину.

  • "Я кладу рис 米 в большой 大 ящик, чтобы хранить его в тёмном складу."

Варианты

奧

Radicals: 丶, 冂, 米, 大  (drop, head, rice, big)
Meaning Mnemonic
If there’s a drop on your head and the rice is big, you know you’re in the interior. And by interior, I mean you’re actually inside someone. The rice is big because you’ve shrunk to a tiny size and are inside someone’s stomach. The drop on your head is actually digestive fluid.
Imagine being in the interior of someone’s tummy. See the big pieces of rice all around you as drops of stomach fluid continue to drop down on your head.
Reading Mnemonic
While you’re in the interior of this guy, you hear him break out in song. He starts singing “Oklahoma” (おく) at the top of his lungs. The big pieces of rice slosh around as he sings and dances. “OOOOk-lahoma, where the wind comes sweepin' down the plain!”
If you’re unfamiliar with this Oklahoma song, check it out on YouTube. Imagine being in the interior of someone’s belly as you hear this song booming all around you.

Examples: 奥 (おく)
冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 大 (большой), 米 (рис)
